p: Currently in India, few states are providing treatment and care for HCV infected patients with DAAs and some healthcare facilities are also providing antiviral treatment for chronic Hepatitis B infection/disease. The National Viral Hepatitis Control Programme (NVHCP) under National Health Mission (NHM), Government of India, aims at smooth transitioning of all state-level programmes to a country-level programme in order to align with the national protocols and guidance on testing and management of different types of viral hepatitis (namely A, B, C, D, and E viruses, respectively).
